posts.post_content:
Hi all. I have four T206 Brown Hindu's for sale:

1.) Rube Marquard (Hall of Fame) - hands at thighs - SGC 10 1
2.) Frank Bowerman - SGC 10 1
3.) George Bell - hands above head - SGC 30 2
4.) Heine Wagner - bat on left shoulder - SGC 10 1

I would like $1,350 for the group, and I will cover the cost of shipping. My preference is to be paid via paypal gift. Shoot me a PM if you are interested. Thank you very much.

-Derek

Hi. If anyone is interested in these, I am happy to trade for T206. I am looking for:

HOF and stars, and some tougher backs, like Tolstoi, American Beauty, Cycle, EPDG, Hindu, Sovereign 460, or if you have any of the tough, tough backs, perhaps I can include some cash. 

Let me know if you are interested. Thanks all.

Derek

The Bowerman is sold, but the other three are still available. Thank you.

Derek

matchmaker, matchmaker, make me a match, and find me a catch ....

these three little brown baseball men are still searching for a new home ... 

cash or t206 trade .... whatever, as long as it results in some brand new T'2 when all is said and done

thanks fellas
Please PM me a price, individually, on each.  Thanks!

bump ... $900 for the three remaining cards which includes a HOF, and I will cover shipping. Thanks.

Derek
